method.name: PUT
method.doc: To update the SNMP Monitoring configuration, issue a HTTP PUT command on the SNMP Monitoring resource URI.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: enabled
param.doc: Enables or disables SNMP Monitoring. Either snmpv1v2c or snmpv3 must be defined if SNMP monitoring is enabled. Only one of snmpv1v2c or snmpv3 may be defined.

param.name: port
param.doc: The port the SNMP agent will listen on. Required if SNMP monitoring is enabled.

param.name: snmpv1v2c
param.doc: The SNMPv1/v2c configuration. Either this element or snmpv3 must be defined if SNMP monitoring is enabled. Only one of snmpv1v2c or snmpv3 may be defined.

param.name: snmpv3
param.doc: The SNMPv3 configuration. Either this element or snmpv1v2c must be defined if SNMP monitoring is enabled. Only one of snmpv1v2c or snmpv3 may be defined.

param.name: community
param.doc: The SNMP Community string.

param.name: securityUser
param.doc: The name of the user to access the SNMP agent

param.name: securityLevel
param.doc: The security level granted to the user. Valid values are: "noAuthNoPriv", "authNoPriv", "authPriv"

param.name: authPassword
param.doc: The password to used with the SNMP user. (Masked in responses)

param.name: authProtocol
param.doc: The protocol associated with the SNMP user password. Valid values are: "MD5", "SHA"

param.name: privacyPassword
param.doc: The privacy password for the SNMP agent. (Masked in responses)

param.name: privacyProtocol
param.doc: The protocol associated with the SNMP privacy password. Valid values are: "DES", "CBC-DES"
